1.Title: Caged Fire
1.Description: The equipper's <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color>. When the equipper's HP decreases, their CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> for 5s.
